page.title: 09LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content:
{LEISURE
Leisure time has increased for many people. This has resulted in the general expansion of the leisure industries.Sports centres and recreation grounds have increased in number in the last five years. Weight training and body-building have become popular and joggers are seen everywhere. Chippenham Harriers were formed two years ago and now have 100+ members and a junior membership of 40+.Personal sports equipment has become an element of the local fashion scene.The video business is booming. People are able to hire films to view in their own homes.Computers are used both as home aids to education and pleasure. Televison has brought the world into the home.
